entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Castlegar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:13 p.m. PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Castlegar Airport 8:00 PM PDT Monday 10 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.7°C
Wind: NNW 17 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Snow level lowering to 1500 metres near midnight. Amount 20 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms in the afternoon. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to 1000 metres in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
